__e: So, you're breaking up with me... in front of a tango class because of your sick aunt Hildy, who you're really close to but you've never mentioned before. -Is that right? -Let's go somewhere else
In answer to your query, yes, I have seen Last Tango in Paris but not recently enough to recall that particular scene you described in such vivid, vivid detail.
The first time I saw Hugo, he was in this dance studio, teaching tango to all these women.
